decisions.description: There's a validation rule that runs to block setting a Tier Plan when the Add Plan field is false. So, we do this. It's dumb.
decisions.name: Is_Add_Plan_False
decisions.label: Is a

decisions.description:
If this is an addendum opportunity, some things are different. There is no minimum on bundles so we're going to set the thresholds to 0.
An Add Service record type is the same as Addendum, but we weren't told about this until the night before launch.
decisions.name: Is_An_Addendum_Opportunity
decisions.label: Is An Addendum Opportunity?

rules.name: It_is_a_New_Sales_Opportunity
rules.label: It is a New Sales Opportunity

decisions.description: If this is an addendum opportunity, some things are different. The contract details screens are different.
decisions.name: Which_Contract_Details_Screen
decisions.label: Which Contract Details Screen?

Flow.description: - Fields on contract details screen are now optional - Addendum field now appears after the Contract Start Date field - Tier plan is no longer set if Add Plan is false AND the record type is Add Service - There are now two versions of the contract details screen - Apparently there's a record type we were never told about that has to behave like Addendum - Checking the "Add Plan" field before setting Tier Plan

fields.fieldText: Should this Addendum update the Renewal Date?

screens.description: Allows the Sales Person to enter a price, in dollars, of how much they want to charge fo for Setup Fees & Recurring Fees. Discount is calculated and applied.
screens.name: Allow_Discount_Override
screens.label: Allow Discount Override

fields.name: OverrideBundlePricing
fields.fieldText: You can override the bundle's price by entering a value below for each of the Setup Fees and Monthly Products. When you enter a dollar amount the system will calculate a discount percentage and apply it evenly across all products that match that type.

fields.name: ProductSubtotalDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Total of Setup Fees: {!totalPriceSelectedSetupFees}

Total of Monthly Fees: {!fTotalPriceRecurringPlusRecurringNonDiscountable}

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter a price higher than {!totalMininumPriceSetupFees}

fields.name: Minimum_Price_for_Setup
fields.fieldText: (Cannot be lower than {!totalMininumPriceSetupFees})

fields.name: OverrideRecurringFeePrice
fields.helpText: Enter a price between {!totalPriceRecurringFees} and {!totalMinimumPriceRecurring}

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter a price between {!totalMinimumPriceRecurring} and {!fTotalPriceRecurringPlusRecurringNonDiscountable}

fields.name: Minimum_Price_For_Monthly_Fees
fields.fieldText: (Cannot be lower than {!totalMinimumPriceRecurring})

screens.description: Displays all active plans and lets the user choose one.
screens.name: Choose_a_Plan_Screen
screens.label: Choose a Plan Screen

fields.name: ChoseABundleInstructions
fields.fieldText:
Choose a bundle from the list below. Bundles have default discount levels and prices set up, but you'll be able to customize them after you've chosen one.

If your Opportunity already has a bundle on it all of the existing bundle products will be removed and replaced with the bundle you choose on this screen.

value.stringValue: [{"apiName":"Name","guid":"column-ac95","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":0,"label":"Bundle Plan Name","type":"text"},{"apiName":"Plan_Discount__c","guid":"column-019d","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":1,"label":"Plan Discount","type":"customPercent"},{"apiName":"Total_Discount_Price_of_Setup_Fees__c","guid":"column-a146","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Setup Fees Total","wrapText":true,"order":2,"label":"Total Discount Price of Setup Fees","type":"currency"},{"apiName":"Total_Discount_Price_of_Other_Products__c","guid":"column-7062","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Other Products Total","wrapText":true,"order":3,"label":"Total Discount Price of Other Products","type":"currency"},{"apiName":"Description__c","guid":"column-5172","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":4,"label":"Description","type":"text"}]

fields.name: AddOtherShizzle
fields.fieldText: You can add other products to your opportunity now, and set the price on the next screens. (You can also do this later, or change products directly from the Opportunity.)

fields.name: Show_Setup_Fee_Pricing_from_Bundle
fields.fieldText:
Setup Fee Pricing

Bundle Price: {!theBundlePlan.Total_Discount_Price_of_Setup_Fees__c}

List Price: {!theBundlePlan.Total_List_of_Setup_Fees__c}

fields.name: CustomizeBundleInstructions
fields.fieldText: You can customize your bundle by removing products from the list below.

fields.name: EnterPriceforProduct
fields.fieldText: Enter the price you want for this product below. The default value is already set.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the quantity matches the number of selected options.
Subscription Start Date has to be in the future.

fields.name: No_Bundles
fields.fieldText:
This Opportunity is using the {!opportunityPriceBookName} pricebook.


There are no active bundles that match this Opportunty's pricebook. You can delete all the products and choose a different Pricebook, or ask someone to create a new bundle.

variables.description: Contains a list of all the products in the bundle, so that we can filter based on that criteria.
variables.name: allBundleProductIds

variables.description: All the products in this bundle.
variables.name: allBundleProducts

variables.description: Stores all current product IDs so we can filter on it.
variables.name: allCurrentProductIds

variables.description: After a bundle is selected, this contains the ID.
variables.name: bundleId

variables.description: Allows the sales person to override the calculated price.
variables.name: discountedPriceRecurringFees

variables.description: The price entered manually by user. This overrides the discount price.
variables.name: manualPriceOtherProducts

variables.description: The product's we're going to add
variables.name: OpportunityProducts

variables.description: The bundle plan chosen by the dude.
variables.name: theBundlePlan

variables.description: the total minimum price of all setup fees (the bundle can't be priced less than this.)
variables.name: totalMininumPriceSetupFees

variables.description: Stores the total value of the recurring fees that have been selected.
variables.name: totalPriceRecurringFees

variables.description: Stores the total price of the setup fees that have been included in the bundle.
variables.name: totalPriceSelectedSetupFees

variables.description: Stores the total value of the non discountable recurring fees that have been selected.
variables.name: vTotalPriceRecurringFeesNonDiscountable
